archimate:Capability.name: Center Force & Queue Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Center Force & Work QueueManagement administers work center workforce and associated skills-based work assignments. It addresses scheduling, work distribution/assignment and planning for current and forecasted center work-loads.Center Force & Work Queue Management also addresses work queuing and work assignment received from various channels including incoming calls, email, and back-office/front-office work distribution and queuing. Work Queuing can be on-line (active customer contact) or off line (no customer "on the line").

properties.value: Care-center work queuing Care-center workforce administration
